means: 诱惑，怂恿( entice的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: The offer was too enticing to refuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 这提议太有诱惑力，使人难以拒绝。

sentence.Network_en: A prospective premium of about 30 per cent on their initial investment is enticing.
sentence.Network_cn: 初始投资30%左右的预期溢价非常具有诱惑力。

sentence.Network_en: Her neck was short but rounded and her arms plump and enticing.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的脖子短,但浑圆可爱;两臂丰腴,也很动人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: enticement 诱惑enticing 引诱的entire chapter 整篇
3. distressing adj. 悲伤的；使痛苦的4. enticing adj. 有吸引力的；迷人的，诱人的5. discerning adj. 有洞察力的；有识别力的.
Choices could include petrol and diesel to compliment the enticing all electric option ., 选择可以包括汽油和柴油 , 以恭维的诱人所有电器的选择.
A nonchalant approach will be far more enticing ., 记住 , 实实在在的你将会更具吸引力;

list.abs: cut back on sugar . stress hormones and brain chemicals might entice you to nibble on sweets , but remember , the first two bites satisfy brain chemistry . anything after that is pure indulgence .削减糖的摄入。应激激素和脑化学物质可能会吸引你吃糖，但请记住，吃两口就足以满足大脑需要。再多吃就纯属放纵了。
people entice you to join in will be less than trustworthy .那些怂恿你加入的人是不值得信任的。
enticements gradually included nifty water-proof swollen thorns to live in , handy nectar fountains , and special ant-food buds atleaf tips .诱饵渐渐囊括了可供蚂蚁居住的防水的漂亮巨刺，现成的蜜露泉，和专为蚂蚁准备的食物——叶尖嫩苞。
outside the store , meanwhile , touts try to entice customers in laminated pamphlets offering up to 25 per cent off the listed price .与此同时，在店外，券贩子正试图吸引顾客进店，他们手里拿着促销券，提供的折扣高达店内明示价格的25%。
they enticed a young girl away from home .他们诱骗了一个少女离家出走。

entry.def: Something that is enticing is extremely attractive and makes you want to get it or to become involved with it.

example.ex: A prospective premium of about 30 per cent on their initial investment is enticing.
example.tran: 初始投资30%左右的预期溢价非常具有诱惑力。

means.word_mean: 1. highly attractive and able to arouse hope or desire;

sentences.sentence: "difficult to say no to an enticing advertisement"

auth_sentence.content: There are equally enticing options for nonfiction readers.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are equally enticing options for nonfiction readers.
